parameters.name: BusinessId
parameters.description: The workflow ID. You can call the [ListBusiness](~~173945~~) operation to obtain the workflow ID.

parameters.name: FolderId
parameters.description: The ID of the folder. You can call the [GetFolder](~~173952~~) or [ListFolders](~~173955~~) operation to obtain the folder ID.

parameters.name: ProjectId
parameters.description: The ID of the DataWorks workspace. You can click the wrench icon in the top-right corner to access the workspace management page and view the ID.

parameters.name: ProjectIdentifier
parameters.description:
The unique identifier of the DataWorks workspace. This is the identifier shown in the workspace switcher at the top of the Data Studio page.

Either this parameter or ProjectId must be specified to determine which DataWorks workspace this API call operates on.

parameters.name: TableGuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the table. You can call the [SearchMetaTables](~~173919~~) operation to obtain the table UUID.
